Vanuatu & New Caledonia from Sydney | Carnival Cruise Lines | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Vanuatu & New Caledonia from Sydney Grinchmas in July - Themed Cruise 10 Days | Sydney Roundtrip Bonus AUD$400 onboard credit per stateroom Deal Details Travel Dates 06 July 2026 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $1,409 per person Enquire Now Bonus AUD$400 onboard credit per stateroom Carnival Grinchmas Cruise – 10-Day South Pacific Holiday from Sydney Set sail on the ultimate holiday escape with Carnival’s Grinchmas Cruise! Departing from Sydney, this 10-day South Pacific adventure blends tropical paradise with festive fun straight from Whoville. Enjoy Grinchmas-themed entertainment, dazzling décor, and holiday treats as you visit stunning destinations including Port Vila, Mystery Island, and Noumea. Between ports, soak up the sunshine on Fun Days at Sea, featuring live shows, delicious dining, and activities for all ages — from family-friendly Grinch games to relaxing spa days. Whether you’re celebrating with loved ones or simply chasing a bit of Christmas cheer, this cruise brings the magic (and mischief!) of Grinchmas to the open ocean. Pricing 9 nights in an Interior Stateroom (Cat 4A) from $1,409* per person, twin share 9 nights in an Obstructed Oceanview Stateroom (Cat 5A) from $1,599* per person, twin share 9 nights in a Balcony Stateroom (Cat 8A) Pictured From $1,989* per person twin share What's Included in your themed cruise Join the Grinch’s festive spree, on a Carnival cruise full of fun and glee! Join us onboard a limited-edition Grinchmas in July-themed cruise in 2026, as our ships are transformed into a magical, festive winter wonderland! In addition to the huge range of activities and entertainment that Carnival Cruise Line is renowned for, these special cruises will also include a host of fun-filled, Grinch-inspired entertainment and activities including: Special appearances by The Grinch Special performances of the magical Holiday Show featuring a surprise guest from the North Pole A glittering Christmas tree with real snow and a tree-lighting ceremony An Ugly Christmas Sweater Competition (because it’s not Christmas in July without one!) Grinchmas Deck Party with an all-green dress code Grinchmas Family Games A Grinchmas Scavenger Hunt And much more! Itinerary Day 1 Sydney (Embarkation) Day 2 Fun Day at Sea Day 3 Fun Day at Sea Day 4 Fun Day at Sea Day 5 Port Villa 8.00am - 4.00pm Day 6 Mystery Island 8.00am - 5.00pm Day 7 Noumea 8.00am - 5.00pm Day 8 Fun Day at Sea Day 9 Fun Day at Sea Day 10 Sydney (Disembarkation) Your Ship- Carnival Adventure Offering 13 decks and a world of fun at your fingertips, Carnival Adventure is perfect for families, couples and groups of friends who are looking to experience it all. Sailing from Sydney, plus select cruises from Melbourne and Singapore, Carnival Adventure has a huge variety of activities on board, including exciting waterslides, four relaxing pools, a thrilling Edge Adventure Park, plus a huge range of bars, entertainment and dining options. You might start your day at the waterslides, or Edge, complete with ziplining, rock climbing and abseiling. Then enjoy a lazy morning poolside, followed by a delicious family lunch. Or, how about a relaxing massage at the day spa while the kids have the time of their lives in the kids clubs? Throw delicious dining at Luke’s Bar & Grill, great bars, and world-class entertainment into the mix and you’ve got yourself a holiday lineup that can only be described as an adventure — a Carnival Adventure. We can’t wait to welcome you onboard! Terms & Conditions Pricing is correct as of 06 November 25. From price is per person twin share valid for sale until 30 November 2025, unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. Valid for new bookings only. Not combinable with other offers. Supplements apply for higher room grades, categories and fare types. Some rooms have obstructed views. Offer ends 30-11-25 unless sold out prior. Offer is available on select Carnival sailings a through July 2028. Advertised fares are available until allocation is exhausted and may fluctuate. ~50% Reduced Deposits: non-refundable, per person/twin share. 2-3 day sailings: $50pp, 4-5 day sailings: $75pp, 6-9 day sailings: $125pp, 10+ day sailings: $200pp. Remainder of the standard deposit and final payment for all guests is due on final payment due date. Offer is not valid for bookings made within the final payment period. ^Onboard Credit (OBC) if applicable is per room, in AUD and applied to the first 2 guests in the room only. Amount varies by itinerary duration as specified. For cruises 2-5 days: $100pp (up to $200 per room). For cruises 6+ days: $200pp (up to $400 per room). OBC expires at the conclusion of your cruise, is not refundable, transferable, redeemable for cash. All travel is subject to the Carnival Cruise Line. Ships' Registry: The Bahamas and Panama.
